de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.spatial.rstarvariants.strategies.split

Class GreeneSplit

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.index.tree.spatial.rstarvariants.strategies.split.GreeneSplit
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SplitStrategy, Parameterizable

    @Reference(authors="Diane Greene",
           title="An implementation and performance analysis of spatial data access methods",
           booktitle="Proceedings of the Fifth International Conference on Data Engineering",
           url="http://dx.doi.org/10.1109/ICDE.1989.47268")
public class GreeneSplit
extends Object
implements SplitStrategy
    Quadratic-time complexity split as used by Diane Greene for the R-Tree. Seed selection is quadratic, distribution is O(n log n). This contains a slight modification to improve performance with point data: with points as seeds, the normalized separation is always 1, so we choose the raw separation then.

    Diane Greene:
    An implementation and performance analysis of spatial data access methods
    In: Proceedings of the Fifth International Conference on Data Engineering
